mapper.select: select b.bu as BU,a.*,c.限价 as 挂网价格,case when a.价格 is not null and c.限价 is not null then (a.价格-c.限价) else '' end as '议价价格-挂网价格' from( SELECT [insert_time] as 数据导出时间-- , cast([procure_catalog_id] as int) as 组件编号-- ,[gpart_name] as 组件名称-- --,[gpartreg_outlookc] as 注册证规格 --,[gpartreg_model] as 注册证型号 --,[gpart_origin] as 产地 --,[code_count] as code数量 --,[com_name_sc] as 生产企业 --,'未确认' as 确认状态 ,[click_hos_name] as 医院-- ,[click_gpart_price] as 价格-- ,case when [click_confirm_state]=1 then '已提交' when [click_confirm_state]=2 then '已确认' when [click_confirm_state]=3 then '拒绝' else '' end as 提交状态 ,[click_edup_time] as 提交时间-- ,[click_gpartreg_outlookc] as 产品规格-- ,[click_gpartreg_model] as 产品型号-- ,[gpartminp_unit] as 单位 ,[regcard_nm] as 注册证编号 -- ,[sync_number] as 数据批次 -- ,[account] as 账号 --,[update_time] FROM [dbo].[Johnson_shanxi_discussPrice] where convert(date,[insert_Time],23)=(select max(convert(date,[insert_Time],23)) from [Johnson_shanxi_catalogue]) and [confirm_state]=1 )a left join ( SELECT [组件编号] ,[BU] FROM [dbo].[Johnson_shanxi_shguawang_bu_20181128] )b on a.组件编号=b.[组件编号] left join ( SELECT --[account] as 账号 --,[search_keyword] as 申报企业搜索词 --, cast([procure_catalog_id] as int) as 组件编号-- --,[gtype_name] as 大类名称 ,[sort_name] as 目录分类-- --,[catalogue_type] as 目录类别 ,[gpart_name] as 组件名称-- ,[gpartreg_outlookc] as 注册证规格-- ,[gpartreg_model] as 注册证型号-- ,[gpart_origin] as 产地-- ,[gpartminp_unit] as 单位-- ,[code_count] as CODE数量-- ,[com_name] as 申报企业名称-- ,[com_name_sc] as 生产企业名称-- ,[regcard_nm] as 注册证编号-- --,[regcard_ded] as 注册证有效期 --,[procure_cata_state] as 状态 ,[gparts_price] as 限价-- --,[sync_number] as 批次 ,[insert_time] as 更新时间-- FROM [dbo].[Johnson_shanxi_catalogue] where convert(date,[insert_Time],23)=(select max(convert(date,[insert_Time],23)) from [Johnson_shanxi_catalogue]) )c on a.组件编号=c.组件编号

select b.[BU] ,a.* from( SELECT --[account] as 账号 --,[search_keyword] as 申报企业搜索词 --, cast([procure_catalog_id] as int) as 组件编号-- --,[gtype_name] as 大类名称 ,[sort_name] as 目录分类-- --,[catalogue_type] as 目录类别 ,[gpart_name] as 组件名称-- ,[gpartreg_outlookc] as 注册证规格-- ,[gpartreg_model] as 注册证型号-- ,[gpart_origin] as 产地-- ,[gpartminp_unit] as 单位-- ,[code_count] as CODE数量-- ,[com_name] as 申报企业名称-- ,[com_name_sc] as 生产企业名称-- ,[regcard_nm] as 注册证编号-- --,[regcard_ded] as 注册证有效期 --,[procure_cata_state] as 状态 ,[gparts_price] as 限价-- --,[sync_number] as 批次 ,[insert_time] as 更新时间-- FROM [dbo].[Johnson_shanxi_catalogue] where convert(date,[insert_Time],23)=(select max(convert(date,[insert_Time],23)) from [Johnson_shanxi_catalogue]) )a left join (SELECT [组件编号] ,[BU] ,[目录分类] ,[组件名称] ,[注册证规格] ,[注册证型号] ,[产地] ,[单位] ,[CODE数量] ,[申报企业名称] ,[生产企业名称] ,[注册证编号] ,[限价] FROM [dbo].[Johnson_shanxi_shguawang_bu_20181128] )b on a.组件编号=b.[组件编号]
